text: Hey Jake, If you are looking to create a more complex menu with additional bells and whistles and such, I would recommend creating a custom module and using the <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/functions#menu|menu function> to create your custom menu. This way you can add any additional content you want to your menu. This also gives you alot of flexibility to build the menu out the way you want.
<@UHA0L28CW> Thank you, does this module actually create blog posts on another HubSpot blog?

Is it possible to add a choice field with dynamic options (or variables) to a custom module? I know a choice field can be added to a template and then used within a module, but I’m hoping to be able to add it directly to the module. Does anyone know if it’s possible?
sure here you find a guide on how to do it: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/how-do-i-add-an-rss-feed-to-one-of-my-HubSpot-pages>
